title: Riot it is time to give Garan the "Voli"fcation
body:
He only gets 15% movement speed from Q when running away from an enemy champion.

It isn't like he is in a bad place currently, But what kind of brave Demacian gets 30% movement speed when running away?

replies.body: Hes not running way hes charging to shop
you sir win my up vote.
What is the title even trying to say
Voli's Q use to have much higher speed at all times and not just when running towards an enemy. It now is a slower movement speed boost when running away.

> [{quoted}](name=ez mental boom,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=33L1ZHJ4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-31T05:02:36.765+0000)
>
> What is the title even trying to say

He was trying to say Volification but he missed an "i".
Udyr would also be a kandidate for that mechanic. It would free up some power for him and allow him to be more than just an annoying splitpusher that can run away from any danger later on.

"let's just shit on Garen for no reason haha"

name checks out
i dont think garen can be good, just playable, cuz hes pretty ez

He's not running away, he's advancing in the other direction.

Like a good student of General Macathur.

because voli is such a viable champion at the moment?

i say revert volis q instead.
